1.name: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
1.description: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed and wreak havoc on her love life.

2.name: Green Book
2.description: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

3.name: Bohemian Rhapsody
3.description: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

4.name: The Favourite
4.description: In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne occupies the throne and her close friend, Lady Sarah, governs the country in her stead. When a new servant, Abigail, arrives, her charm endears her to Sarah.

5.name: A Quiet Place
5.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

6.name: Aquaman
6.description: Arthur Curry (Jason Momoa), the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

7.name: Ready Player One
7.description: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

8.name: Avengers: Infinity War
8.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

9.name: Hereditary
9.description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

10.name: Black Panther
10.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

11.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
11.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing his path with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

12.name: A Star Is Born
12.description: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

13.name: Red Sparrow
13.description: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.

14.name: Roma
14.description: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

15.name: Deadpool 2
15.description: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

16.name: The VelociPastor
16.description: After losing his parents, a priest travels to China, where he inherits a mysterious ability that allows him to turn into a dinosaur. At first horrified by this new power, a hooker convinces him to use it to fight crime. And ninjas.

17.name: BlacKkKlansman
17.description: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, CO, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan branch with the help of a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.

18.name: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
18.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

19.name: Crazy Rich Asians
19.description: This contemporary romantic comedy, based on a global bestseller, follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.

20.name: Mary Queen of Scots
20.description: Mary Stuart's attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I, Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.

21.name: Bad Times at the El Royale
21.description: Early 1970s. Four strangers check in at the El Royale Hotel. The hotel is deserted, staffed by a single desk clerk. Some of the new guests' reasons for being there are less than innocent and some are not who they appear to be.

22.name: Vice
22.description: The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today.

23.name: A Simple Favor
23.description: Stephanie is a single mother with a parenting vlog who befriends Emily, a secretive upper-class woman who has a child at the same elementary school. When Emily goes missing, Stephanie takes it upon herself to investigate.

24.name: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
24.description: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

25.name: 12 Strong
25.description: 12 Strong tells the story of the first Special Forces team deployed to Afghanistan after 9/11; under the leadership of a new captain, the team must work with an Afghan warlord to take down the Taliban.

26.name: Annihilation
26.description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

27.name: Beoning
27.description: Jong-su bumps into a girl who used to live in the same neighborhood, who asks him to look after her cat while she's on a trip to Africa. When back, she introduces Ben, a mysterious guy she met there, who confesses his secret hobby.

28.name: Isle of Dogs
28.description: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

29.name: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
29.description: The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.

30.name: Solo: A Star Wars Story
30.description: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.

31.name: Instant Family
31.description: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children.

32.name: Venom
32.description: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

33.name: Fifty Shades Freed
33.description: Anastasia and Christian get married, but Jack Hyde continues to threaten their relationship.

34.name: Beautiful Boy
34.description: Based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff, Beautiful Boy chronicles the heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse, and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.

35.name: The Mule
35.description: A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.

36.name: Mandy
36.description: The enchanted lives of a couple in a secluded forest are brutally shattered by a nightmarish hippie cult and their demon-biker henchmen, propelling a man into a spiraling, surreal rampage of vengeance.

37.name: Bumblebee
37.description: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. On the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, Charlie Watson discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken.

38.name: Widows
38.description: Set in contemporary Chicago, amid a time of turmoil, four women with nothing in common except a debt left behind by their dead husbands' criminal activities, take fate into their own hands, and conspire to forge a future on their own terms.

39.name: First Man
39.description: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

40.name: Peter Rabbit
40.description: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

41.name: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
41.description: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

42.name: Ocean's Eight
42.description: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.

43.name: Bird Box
43.description: Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

44.name: Nomis
44.description: A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a recently arrested, troubled man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders.

45.name: The Kissing Booth
45.description: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

46.name: Hotel Mumbai
46.description: The true story of the Taj Hotel terrorist attack in Mumbai. Hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

47.name: The Nightingale
47.description: Set in 1825, Clare, a young Irish convict woman, chases a British officer through the rugged Tasmanian wilderness, bent on revenge for a terrible act of violence he committed against her family. On the way she enlists the services of an Aboriginal tracker named Billy, who is also marked by trauma from his own violence-filled past.

48.name: Freaks
48.description: A bold girl discovers a bizarre, threatening, and mysterious new world beyond her front door after she escapes her father's protective and paranoid control.

49.name: Mary Poppins Returns
49.description: A few decades after her original visit, Mary Poppins (Emily Blunt), the magical nanny, returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's (Ben Whishaw's) children through a difficult time in their lives.

50.name: Capharnaüm
50.description: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.
